column1: In terms of section 45(2)(b) of the 2006 Act profits and  income from any agricultural undertaking

means-
(i)  in  the case  of an  undertaking  referred  to in  subparagraph  (ii)  of paragraph  (a),  the

in  any  other 
profits  and  income from  fees  for  providing the services  of management;  and  (ii)
case,  the  profits  and  income from  the  sale  of produce of such  undertaking without subjecting
such  produce to any process of production or manufacture.
